metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44568 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Two heap-overflow vulnerabilities exist in openSUSE/libsolv libsolv through 13 Dec 2020 in the decisionmap variable via the resolve_dependencies function at src/solver.c (line 1940 & line 1995), which could cause a remote Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: libsolv package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
